mapper.update: update hm_erp_scene set shoot_id = #{shootId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scene_name = #{sceneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scene_status = #{sceneStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, shoot_id, scene_name, scene_status, priority, company_id from hm_erp_scene
